issue.title: Constraints on bitmask and enumeration types to be tightened

discussion.p: Constraints on bitmask and enumeration types were supposed to be tightened up as part of the motivation for the constexpr feature - see paper N2235 for details
Adopt wording in line with the motivation described in N2235
discussion.blockquote: Move to Open. Ping Robert Klarer to provide wording, using N2235 as guidance.

rationale.p: UK NB did not sufficiently describe how to resolve their comment, and therefore we cannot make a change for the FCD. If a resolution were provided in the future, we would be happy to apply it.
